items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and progress with friends within the app. Ensure only authenticated users can share and view activities.
acceptance_criteria: Only authenticated users can post completed workouts to a social feed.
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities if they are authenticated.
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds.

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by sending and accepting friend requests or following profiles. Access requires authentication.
acceptance_criteria: Only authenticated users can search for other users by name or username.
Only authenticated users can send, accept, or decline friend requests.
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second.
System should handle up to 1 million user profiles.

items.title: User Authentication
items.description: Implement secure authentication to ensure only authorized users can access social features.
acceptance_criteria: Users must log in with valid credentials before accessing social features.
Authentication tokens expire after a configurable period and require re-login.
non_functional: Authentication response time should be under 500ms.

notes: The requirement now explicitly includes authentication for all social features. Added a dedicated 'User Authentication' item to ensure secure access control.
